description:
Their powers run out of control, and strange forms begin appearing on their bodies. When the girls are told they`re no longer human, they`re unable to accept reality, and Rito, Mari, and Kotoko clash fiercely. Rito is overwhelmed by the shock, and Sayumi kindly cheers her up. Rito begins running through the downpour in Harajuku in order to make up with her friends without realizing what`s become of them.
Source: crunchyroll
